name: A. Adding Digits
statement:
Vasya has got two number: and . However, Vasya finds number too short.
So he decided to repeat the operation of lengthening number times.One
operation of lengthening a number means adding exactly one digit to the
number (in the decimal notation) to the right provided that the
resulting number is divisible by Vasya’s number . If it is impossible to
obtain the number which is divisible by , then the lengthening operation
cannot be performed.Your task is to help Vasya and print the number he
can get after applying the lengthening operation to number times.
